# encodedPixelsDimensions

**Instance Property**

The encoded pixels dimensions of the track.

## Declaration

```swift
var encodedPixelsDimensions: CGSize { get set }
```

## Accessing visual characteristics

- **naturalSize**: The dimensions used to display the visual media data for the track.
- **preferredTransform**: The transform performed on the visual media data of the track for display purposes.
- **layer**: The layer level for the visual media of the track.
- **cleanApertureDimensions**: The clean aperture dimension of the track.
- **productionApertureDimensions**: The production aperture dimensions of the track.
